title: 02/17/2021 – Hour 3 – It’s Time For A Rebuild in Pittsburgh. Guest- Eric Pincus
itunes:title: 02/17/2021 – Hour 3 – It’s Time For A Rebuild in Pittsburgh. Guest- Eric Pincus
description:
LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress sit in for Dan Patrick explain why the Steelers need to consider their future and move on from Ben Roethlisberger and JuJu Smith-Schuster. Plus, Bleacher Report’s Eric Pincus stops by to detail how the Lakers plan to handle manage Anthony Davis after a scary injury to his ankle.


Subscribe, rate and review Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress. Listen to the show LIVE on Fox Sports Radio Saturdays 1-3pm ET!

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/up-on-game/id1542652485

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
